Question
========
What is the average of the differences between the block test scores of 4.2 (v42) and the block test scores of 4.3 (v43)? Assume the following difference: v43 minus v42. Write your answer in the answer box (using 4 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-264-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-264-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 0.8925.
